column4: what wireless card that I can possible get for my laptop that is 100% compatible with linux?
my motorola WN825GP works perfectly for me

I have a internal broadcom on my father laptop and I can't get it to work.. and they say that the b43-fwcutter for intrepid is broken.. so I gave up on that and don want do try ndiswrapper.. so it≈õ just easier to get a new card
